whisper_context_prompt: conversation, hindi, english, sales, interested, yes, no, price, meeting, 360 view

messages.greeting: Namaste! Aapko Chaat AI ki taraf se call aa raha hai. Kya aap thodi der baat kar sakte hain?
messages.silence_check: Hello? Kya aap sun pa rahe hain?
messages.outside_hours: Maaf kijiye, abhi hum unavailable hain. Subah 9 baje se shaam 8 baje ke beech call karein.
messages.goodbye: Bahut shukriya aapka samay dene ke liye. Aage bhi baat karenge. Dhanyavaad!
messages.rate_limit_exit: Maaf kijiye, abhi hamari line thodi busy hai. Thodi der mein dobara call karte hain.
messages.error_fallback: Maaf kijiye, mujhe samajh nahi aaya. Kya aap dobara bol sakte hain?
